channel.title: Change text color and change custom health bar
channel.description: how do i change the over all text color like say im playing on a server and i say hi. instead of typing white:hi... i wanna exclude that process. also how do i change my health bar to whatever i want.? :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2008, 06:56:56 pm[/size][hr]hello anyone?

item.title: Change text color and change custom health bar
item.dc:creator: @Exiled-Isle Exiled-Isle
item.description:
@Exiled-Isle wrote:

Oh, you need a client to change the color of your speech without saying white:hi if you have one search “yellow” usually what most default colors are and it should say something like int = 0 change that to 4 to make it purple experiment like 3,2,1… so on.

Read full topic
item.source: Change text color and change custom health bar
